data.eml:eml: A new species of Raputia (Rutaceae) from the Selva Central of Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandez-Hilario, Robin, Arteaga, Robert (2017): A new species of Raputia (Rutaceae) from the Selva Central of Peru. PhytoKeys 89: 73-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.89.20136, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.89.20136
